methods.int getNumCols(): Returns the number of columns in this matrix.
methods.int getNumRows(): Returns the number of rows in this matrix.
methods.MatrixIterator iterator(boolean rowMajor: Creates a new iterator for traversing through a submatrix inside this matrix.
methods.void reshape(int numRows, int numCols): Equivalent to invoking reshape(numRows, numCols, false);
methods.void reshape(int numRows, int numCols, b: Changes the number of rows and columns in the matrix, allowing its size to grow or shrink.
methods.void set(ReshapeMatrix64F A): Assigns the value of 'this' matrix to be the same as 'A'.
